name: Pico Snail!: Dream Castle
description:
Pico Snail is a work in progress Pico-8 game inspired by the musician Snail's House.

You play as Snail-Chan, and are tasked with defending the Dream castle! You can run, jump, thwack enemies, and use stars you collect to execute special powers.

I haven't been able to get a web version working, so in the mean time you can just download it. That might be better since you can save your progress!
